data: In the Paris of the Empire there were found Thirteen men equally impressed with the same idea, equally endowed with energy enough to keep them true to it, while among themselves they were loyal enough to keep faith even when their interests seemed to clash.
Balzac, Honoré de, 1799-1850; Saintsbury, George, 1845-1933 [Author of introduction, etc.]; Marriage, Ellen, 1865-1946 [Translator]
